DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate efficacy icotinib , first generation EGFR TKI , non-small cell lung cancer patient harbor uncommon EGFR mutation
DOC.brief_title: Icotinib Non-small Cell Lung Cancer Patients With Uncommon EGFR Mutation
DOC.criteria: Patients stage IIIB/IV nonsmall cell lung cancer Patients uncommon epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) mutation Targetedtherapynaive patient Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 , 1 2 Evaluable target lesion accord RECIST 1.1 tumour response assessment Wildtype EGFR Positive 19 del and/or 21 L858R mutation Previous treatment EGFR TKIs gefitinib , erlotinib , afatinib Patients documented history interstitial lung disease
